name: Cherchez
description:
Game finished 6th in wonderful LOWREZJAM 2016! I'm working hard to get this one finished and polished (see notes below).

You play as Mr. Cherchez, a baron who spent his life searching for a mythical altar promised to be able to create a perfect woman. He finally go to the other side of the world, to a land of three goddesses that have the power.

Use arrows and space to play. The game has been made with as minimal number of text information as possible (actually there are three words: RECIPE, ITEM and INVENTORY). I tried to bring classic mechanics of grinding & crafting to a bare minimum.

It was a quite challenging project I took to finish in very short time (spent 3 days on it). I took the hard path of using good old C and my own micro game engine Punity. The game is not quite finished yet. I'll do my best to finish game's missing ending scene (one godess + the game ending), so hold your horses if you want to know how the story ends. I had a ton of fun working on this, but now lemme sleep for a few days.

Changelog

  • Version 3 - finally fixed the audio!
  • Version 2 - fixed window title and hid the console window.
  • Version 1 - original submission.
